title: Update Contact fallback address and phone

requirements.summary: Update the Contact section to use the new address and phone number as fallback values when companyInfo is unavailable.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Contact page, if `companyInfo?.address` is not available, the displayed address fallback is exactly "Pupri, Sitamarhi, Bihar, 843314, India".
On the Contact page, if `companyInfo?.phone` is not available, the displayed phone fallback is exactly "+91 8879802001".

file_operations.description: Replace the hardcoded fallback strings for Address and Phone in the Contact Information card so they exactly match the new required values when `companyInfo` is null/undefined or missing those fields. Ensure no changes are made under frontend/src/components/ui and keep all other content (email, business hours, etc.) unchanged.
